name: Flourish and Ruin
summary: You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes.
description:
You can call upon the vital essence of your spirit to restore life to your allies and call forth vines to ensnare and bludgeon your foes. You can cast field of life and tangling creepers as 6th-level primal innate spells once per day each. You become an expert in primal spell attack rolls and primal spell DCs.Traits

Leshy: Leshies are living plants animated by primal magic.
